text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ACBS$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ACBS$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CB$ is $40$ units.
The length of the line $SD$ is $28$ units.
The length of the line $DB$ is $38$ units.
Point $S$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $D$.
The line connecting $B$ and $D$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $D$ and $S$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $AS$, and $CB$, forming the parallelogram $ACBS$.
